text: @TomiLahren 'Coronavirus Lockdown Tyrrany' is only tyrannical coz....ok I am not gonna type that...that thing in my head sounded inhumane...I wonder if she feels the same...if she ever felt, 'ok, maybe I shouldn't say that coz that is wrong'...maybe apathy makes us amoral..just maybe
